name: Issue #1 Digital Copy
description:
The Uncanny Undergrads is an Action Comedy comic book concept that's heavy on character development. Its the story of a Professor who always wanted to be somebody and finally has his chance to when he secretly gathers four super powered college freshman at his school using a campus club as a cover. However, this has not gone unnoticed by the infamous Second Third Reich, a cultist nazi influenced crime syndicate that's obsessed with ancient prophecies who want to use those with super human abilities for their own means.

This is a story that goes into finding ones personal identity, living in a world where others that don't understand you try to manipulate your fate whether they have good intentions or not, and how to overcome that and come into your own. I think its a good story with a positive message with a lot of action and fun along the way. Its something I'm very passionate about, and with the help of illustrator Bob Wulff (the real hero here), I finally have a chance to see it drawn out.
